TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IWcfReferenceReceiveContextInformation

summary.span: 定义要为获取附加上下文信息而实现的接口。

span.span: Defines the interface to implement to obtain additional context information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过此接口，WSDL 导入程序机制可以接收额外的上下文信息，以便更好地生成代理和在 Visual Studio 中获得更好的开发人员体验。This interface enables the WSDL importer mechanism to receive extra context information for better proxy generation and a better developer experience inside Visual Studio. 如果 WSDL 导入程序实现了 接口，则在 `ReceiveImportContextInformation` 调用和的任何方法之前，WCF 代理生成器将调用方法 。If the WSDL importer implements the interface, the `ReceiveImportContextInformation` method will be called by the WCF proxy generator before any methods of and are called. 其他上下文信息引用传递给方法的参数 `ReceiveImportContextInformation` 。The additional context information refers to the parameters passed to the `ReceiveImportContextInformation` method. 参数包括任何扩展文件的内容以及对实现接口的对象的引用 。The parameters include the content of any extension files and a reference to an object that implements the interface. 传递给方法的任何扩展文件都特定于导入程序，并用于存储所需的任何其他信息。Any extension files passed to the method are specific to the importer and are used to store any additional information they need. 也就是说，Visual Studio 不会控制这些文件的内容，也不会直接使用这些文件。That is, Visual Studio does not control the content of these files and does not use them directly. > [!NOTE] > 导入程序引用 WCF 扩展性机制。Importers refer to a WCF extensibility mechanism. 此机制使您可以自定义从描述服务的元数据（WSDL/XSD）文档生成代理代码的方式。This mechanism enables you to customize the way proxy code is generated from metadata (WSDL/XSD) documents that describe the service. 有关详细信息，请参阅 MSDN 上的[导入 WCF 扩展的自定义元数据](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=92310)。For more information, see [Importing Custom Metadata for a WCF Extension](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=92310) on MSDN.

MemberSignature.Value: public void ReceiveImportContextInformation (System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary<string,byte[]> serviceReferenceExtensionFileContents, IServiceProvider serviceProvider);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ReceiveImportContextInformation(class System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2<string, unsigned int8[]> serviceReferenceExtensionFileContents, class System.IServiceProvider serviceProvider) cil managed
Public Sub ReceiveImportContextInformation (serviceReferenceExtensionFileContents As IDictionary(Of String, Byte()), serviceProvider As IServiceProvider)

public: void ReceiveImportContextInformation(System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::String ^, cli::array <System::Byte> ^> ^ serviceReferenceExtensionFileContents, IServiceProvider ^ serviceProvider);
abstract member ReceiveImportContextInformation : System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary<string, byte[]> * IServiceProvider -> unit

param.name: serviceReferenceExtensionFileContents
param.span: 提供与 WCF 服务引用的 .svcmap 文件相关联的任何扩展文件的内容。

span.span: Provides the content of any extension files that are associated with the .svcmap file of a WCF service reference.

param.name: serviceProvider
param.span: 对 Visual Studio 服务提供程序的引用，用于查询附加信息的。

span.span: A reference to a Visual Studio service provider to be queried for additional information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `serviceReferenceExtensionFileContents`参数提供与 WCF 服务引用的 .svcmap 文件相关联的任何扩展文件的内容，例如 Reference.config 或已通过扩展性添加的自定义扩展文件。The `serviceReferenceExtensionFileContents` parameter provides the content of any extension files associated with the .svcmap file of a WCF service reference, such as Reference.config or custom extension files that have been added through extensibility. > [!NOTE] > 在 ASP.NET 生成提供程序的上下文中运行时，从特定于 Visual Studio 的服务提供程序收到的任何接口都将无法用于导入扩展。Any interface received from the service provider that is specific to Visual Studio will not be available to an import extension when running in the context of an ASP.NET build provider. 在 ASP.NET 项目中编译 WCF 服务引用时，就会出现这种情况。This is the case when a WCF service reference is compiled in an ASP.NET project.
